EmailTemplate.name: AZ Corp Dissolution Corp
EmailTemplate.subject: AZ Corp Dissolution Corp
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
URGENT ACTION REQUIRED: Your Legalzoom order # XXXXXX
Dear {!Contact.FirstName},
Thank you for choosing LegalZoom for your Dissolution order. Attached, please find your customized Dissolution documents. In order to ensure your order is processed as quickly as possible, please follow the steps listed below.
>Print two (2) copies of the document on white paper using black ink only. >Please fill in number 3 of the Certificate of Cancellation. This section must be filled out completely. >Sign your name in black ink on all copies as indicated. >Do not make any changes to the attached Certificate of Cancellation it will result in delays with your order. If you need to make changes, please contact our Customer Support. >A certificate of compliance from the Arizona Department of Revenue stating that the tax levied under A.R.S. Title 42, chapter 5, article 1 against the corporation has been paid or that the applicant is not subject to the tax is required to be included with this form. This document is enclosed; please fill out relevant Tax ID #?s. >Mail all documents (Tax Clearance & Certificate of Cancellation) to our address listed below. Please note that we cannot accept faxes as the state office will only accept original signed documents.
Courier Deliveries LegalZoom.com, Inc. ATTN: Business Filings 101 North Brand Blvd. 10th Flr. Glendale, CA 91203
USPS Deliveries LegalZoom.com, Inc. ATTN: Business Filings 101 North Brand Blvd., 10th Flr. POB 29096 Glendale, CA 91203
{!snippetVariable.cccontactline} {!snippetVariable.cc_dept_full} {!snippetVariable.ccassistline} {!snippetVariable.ccphone}. {!snippetVariable.ourrr} {!snippetVariable.cc_dept_full} {!snippetVariable.ccbizhourline} {!snippetVariable.cchours}.
{!snippetVariable.ccsincerely}
{!snippetVariable.cclegalzoomline} {!snippetVariable.cc_dept_full} {!snippetVariable.ccphone} | {!snippetVariable.lz_address} {!snippetVariable.lz_website}
This is a service email related to your LegalZoom account. For more information about how LegalZoom uses your information, please see the Privacy Policy: http://www.legalzoom.com/privacy-policy-popup.html
LegalZoom provides access to independent attorneys and self-help services at your specific direction. We are not a law firm or a substitute for an attorney or law firm. Prices, features, terms and conditions are subject to change without notice. LegalZoom is located at 9900 Spectrum Drive, Austin, TX 78717.
Please add services@emails.legalzoom.com to your address book.
This email was sent to: {!Contact.Email}
